headline: RBC downgrades Global Payments on rising risks tied to Worldpay deal
summary: Investing.com -- RBC Capital Markets downgraded Global Payments (NYSE:GPN) Inc to Sector Perform from Outperform on rising execution risks and a more prolonged transformation following the company’s acquisition of Worldpay and sale of its Issuer Solutions business.

headline: Global Payments to Report First Quarter Results on May 6, 2025
summary: ATLANTA, April 25, 2025--Global Payments Inc. (NYSE: GPN) will release first quarter financial results before the market opens on Tuesday, May 6, 2025.
